original_title: Gamma Ray: Hell Yeah!!! The Awesome Foursome: Live In Montreal
overview: After coming off a successful US run with fellow Power Metal masters Helloween, Gamma Ray is releasing their first live DVD with their current lineup. The DVD features a multi-camera recording of the band s May 6, 2006 show at Le Medley in Montreal, Quebec as well as lots of bonus features including: a road movie, a documentary covering Gamma Ray s history, behind-the-scenes footage and much more.
title: Gamma Ray: Hell Yeah!!! The Awesome Foursome: Live In Montreal
